template.template: Template Module Linux CPU by Zabbix agent
template.name: Template Module Linux CPU by Zabbix agent

item.name: Загрузка процессора
item.description: Загрузка процессора в %

item.name: CPU idle time
item.description: The time the CPU has spent doing nothing.

item.name: CPU system time
item.description: The time the CPU has spent running the kernel and its processes.

item.name: CPU user time
item.description: The time the CPU has spent running users' processes that are not niced.

item.name: CPU nice time
item.description: The time the CPU has spent running users' processes that have been niced.

item.name: CPU iowait time
item.description: Amount of time the CPU has been waiting for I/O to complete.

item.name: CPU steal time
item.description: The amount of CPU 'stolen' from this virtual machine by the hypervisor for other tasks (such as running another virtual machine).

item.name: CPU interrupt time
item.description: The amount of time the CPU has been servicing hardware interrupts.

item.name: CPU softirq time
item.description: The amount of time the CPU has been servicing software interrupts.

item.name: CPU guest time
item.description: Guest time (time spent running a virtual CPU for a guest operating system)

item.name: CPU guest nice time
item.description: Time spent running a niced guest (virtual CPU for guest operating systems under the control of the Linux kernel)

template.template: Template Module Linux filesystems by Zabbix agent
template.name: Template Module Linux filesystems by Zabbix agent

discovery_rule.name: Mounted filesystem discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of file systems of different types.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Module Linux filesystems by Zabbix agent:vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},pused].last()}>{$VFS.FS.PUSED.MAX.CRIT:"{#FSNAME}"} and (({Template Module Linux filesystems by Zabbix agent:vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},total].last()}-{Template Module Linux filesystems by Zabbix agent:vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},used].last()})<5G or {Template Module Linux filesystems by Zabbix agent:vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},pused].timeleft(1h,,100)}<1d)
trigger_prototype.name: {#FSNAME}: Мало свободного места (использовано > {$VFS.FS.PUSED.MAX.CRIT:"{#FSNAME}"}%)
trigger_prototype.description: Space used: {ITEM.LASTVALUE3} of {ITEM.LASTVALUE2} ({ITEM.LASTVALUE1}) Two conditions should match: First, space utilization should be above {$VFS.FS.PUSED.MAX.CRIT:"{#FSNAME}"}. Second condition should be one of the following: - The disk free space is less than 5G. - The disk will be full in less than 24 hours.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Module Linux filesystems by Zabbix agent:vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},pused].last()}>{$VFS.FS.PUSED.MAX.WARN:"{#FSNAME}"} and (({Template Module Linux filesystems by Zabbix agent:vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},total].last()}-{Template Module Linux filesystems by Zabbix agent:vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},used].last()})<10G or {Template Module Linux filesystems by Zabbix agent:vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},pused].timeleft(1h,,100)}<1d)
trigger_prototype.name: {#FSNAME}: Мало свободного места (использовано > {$VFS.FS.PUSED.MAX.WARN:"{#FSNAME}"}%)
trigger_prototype.description: Space used: {ITEM.LASTVALUE3} of {ITEM.LASTVALUE2} ({ITEM.LASTVALUE1}) Two conditions should match: First, space utilization should be above {$VFS.FS.PUSED.MAX.WARN:"{#FSNAME}"}. Second condition should be one of the following: - The disk free space is less than 10G. - The disk will be full in less than 24 hours.

dependency.name: {#FSNAME}: Мало свободного места (использовано > {$VFS.FS.PUSED.MAX.CRIT:"{#FSNAME}"}%)
dependency.expression: {Template Module Linux filesystems by Zabbix agent:vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},pused].last()}>{$VFS.FS.PUSED.MAX.CRIT:"{#FSNAME}"} and (({Template Module Linux filesystems by Zabbix agent:vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},total].last()}-{Template Module Linux filesystems by Zabbix agent:vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},used].last()})<5G or {Template Module Linux filesystems by Zabbix agent:vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},pused].timeleft(1h,,100)}<1d)

trigger_prototype.name: {#FSNAME}: Мало inodes на диске! (< {$VFS.FS.INODE.PFREE.MIN.CRIT:"{#FSNAME}"}%)
{#FSNAME}: Мало inodes на диске! (< {$VFS.FS.INODE.PFREE.MIN.WARN:"{#FSNAME}"}%)

item.host: Template Module Linux filesystems by Zabbix agent
Template Module Linux filesystems by Zabbix agent

template.template: Template Module Linux memory by Zabbix agent
template.name: Template Module Linux memory by Zabbix agent

item.name: Memory utilization
item.description: Memory used percentage is calculated as (100-pavailable)

item.name: Total memory
item.description: Total memory in Bytes

item.name: Available memory
item.description: Available memory, in Linux, available = free + buffers + cache. On other platforms calculation may vary. See also: https://www.zabbix.com/documentation/current/manual/appendix/items/vm.memory.size_params

item.name: Total swap space
item.description: The total space of swap volume/file in bytes.

item.name: Free swap space
item.description: The free space of swap volume/file in bytes.

item.name: Free swap space in %
item.description: The free space of swap volume/file in percent.

template.template: Template Module Linux block devices by Zabbix agent
template.name: Template Module Linux block devices by Zabbix agent

item_prototype.name: {#DEVNAME}: Disk read rate
item_prototype.description: r/s. The number (after merges) of read requests completed per second for the device.

item_prototype.name: {#DEVNAME}: Disk write rate
item_prototype.description: w/s. The number (after merges) of write requests completed per second for the device.

item_prototype.name: {#DEVNAME}: Disk read time (rate)
item_prototype.description: Rate of total read time counter. Used in r_await calculation

item_prototype.name: {#DEVNAME}: Disk write time (rate)
item_prototype.description: Rate of total write time counter. Used in w_await calculation

item_prototype.name: {#DEVNAME}: Disk read request avg waiting time (r_await)
item_prototype.description: This formula contains two boolean expressions that evaluates to 1 or 0 in order to set calculated metric to zero and to avoid division by zero exception.

item_prototype.name: {#DEVNAME}: Disk write request avg waiting time (w_await)
item_prototype.description: This formula contains two boolean expressions that evaluates to 1 or 0 in order to set calculated metric to zero and to avoid division by zero exception.

item_prototype.name: {#DEVNAME}: Disk average queue size (avgqu-sz)
item_prototype.description: Current average disk queue, the number of requests outstanding on the disk at the time the performance data is collected.

item_prototype.name: {#DEVNAME}: Disk utilization
item_prototype.description: This item is the percentage of elapsed time that the selected disk drive was busy servicing read or writes requests.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Module Linux block devices by Zabbix agent:vfs.dev.read.await[{#DEVNAME}].min(15m)} > {$VFS.DEV.READ.AWAIT.WARN:"{#DEVNAME}"} or {Template Module Linux block devices by Zabbix agent:vfs.dev.write.await[{#DEVNAME}].min(15m)} > {$VFS.DEV.WRITE.AWAIT.WARN:"{#DEVNAME}"}
trigger_prototype.name: {#DEVNAME}: Disk read/write request responses are too high (read > {$VFS.DEV.READ.AWAIT.WARN:"{#DEVNAME}"} ms for 15m or write > {$VFS.DEV.WRITE.AWAIT.WARN:"{#DEVNAME}"} ms for 15m)
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1} This trigger might indicate disk {#DEVNAME} saturation.

item.host: Template Module Linux block devices by Zabbix agent
Template Module Linux block devices by Zabbix agent

template.template: Template Module Linux network interfaces by Zabbix agent
template.name: Template Module Linux network interfaces by Zabbix agent
template.description:
Known Issues:
Description: High interface utilization trigger is removed since currently it is not possible to retrieve interface speed to determine the max bandwidth.
Template tooling version used: 0.33

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}: Текущий статус интерфейса
item_prototype.description: Indicates the interface RFC2863 operational state as a string. Possible values are:"unknown", "notpresent", "down", "lowerlayerdown", "testing","dormant", "up". Reference: https://www.kernel.org/doc/Documentation/ABI/testing/sysfs-class-net

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}: Тип интерфейса
item_prototype.description: Indicates the interface protocol type as a decimal value. See include/uapi/linux/if_arp.h for all possible values. Reference: https://www.kernel.org/doc/Documentation/ABI/testing/sysfs-class-net

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Module Linux network interfaces by Zabbix agent:net.if.in["{#IFNAME}",errors].min(5m)}>{$IF.ERRORS.WARN:"{#IFNAME}"} or {Template Module Linux network interfaces by Zabbix agent:net.if.out["{#IFNAME}",errors].min(5m)}>{$IF.ERRORS.WARN:"{#IFNAME}"}
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: {Template Module Linux network interfaces by Zabbix agent:net.if.in["{#IFNAME}",errors].max(5m)}<{$IF.ERRORS.WARN:"{#IFNAME}"}*0.8 and {Template Module Linux network interfaces by Zabbix agent:net.if.out["{#IFNAME}",errors].max(5m)}<{$IF.ERRORS.WARN:"{#IFNAME}"}*0.8
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}: Большое количество ошибок интерфейса ( > {$IF.ERRORS.WARN:"{#IFNAME}"} в течение 5m)
trigger_prototype.description: errors in: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}, errors out: {ITEM.LASTVALUE2} Восстановление когда ниже 80% от значения {$IF.ERRORS.WARN:"{#IFNAME}"}

dependency.name: Interface {#IFNAME}: Интерфейс недоступен
dependency.expression: {$IFCONTROL:"{#IFNAME}"}=1 and ({Template Module Linux network interfaces by Zabbix agent:vfs.file.contents["/sys/class/net/{#IFNAME}/operstate"].last()}=2 and {Template Module Linux network interfaces by Zabbix agent:vfs.file.contents["/sys/class/net/{#IFNAME}/operstate"].diff()}=1)
dependency.recovery_expression: {Template Module Linux network interfaces by Zabbix agent:vfs.file.contents["/sys/class/net/{#IFNAME}/operstate"].last()}<>2

trigger_prototype.expression: {$IFCONTROL:"{#IFNAME}"}=1 and ({Template Module Linux network interfaces by Zabbix agent:vfs.file.contents["/sys/class/net/{#IFNAME}/operstate"].last()}=2 and {Template Module Linux network interfaces by Zabbix agent:vfs.file.contents["/sys/class/net/{#IFNAME}/operstate"].diff()}=1)
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: {Template Module Linux network interfaces by Zabbix agent:vfs.file.contents["/sys/class/net/{#IFNAME}/operstate"].last()}<>2
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}: Интерфейс недоступен

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Module Linux network interfaces by Zabbix agent:vfs.file.contents["/sys/class/net/{#IFNAME}/type"].change()}<0 and {Template Module Linux network interfaces by Zabbix agent:vfs.file.contents["/sys/class/net/{#IFNAME}/type"].last()}>0 and ({Template Module Linux network interfaces by Zabbix agent:vfs.file.contents["/sys/class/net/{#IFNAME}/type"].last()}=6 or {Template Module Linux network interfaces by Zabbix agent:vfs.file.contents["/sys/class/net/{#IFNAME}/type"].last()}=1) and ({Template Module Linux network interfaces by Zabbix agent:vfs.file.contents["/sys/class/net/{#IFNAME}/operstate"].last()}<>2)
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: ({Template Module Linux network interfaces by Zabbix agent:vfs.file.contents["/sys/class/net/{#IFNAME}/type"].change()}>0 and {Template Module Linux network interfaces by Zabbix agent:vfs.file.contents["/sys/class/net/{#IFNAME}/type"].prev()}>0) or ({Template Module Linux network interfaces by Zabbix agent:vfs.file.contents["/sys/class/net/{#IFNAME}/operstate"].last()}=2)
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}: Интерфейс перешел на более низкую скорость, чем был ранее
trigger_prototype.description: Current reported speed: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1} This Ethernet connection has transitioned down from its known maximum speed. This might be a sign of autonegotiation issues. Ack to close.

dependency.name: Interface {#IFNAME}: Интерфейс недоступен
dependency.expression: {$IFCONTROL:"{#IFNAME}"}=1 and ({Template Module Linux network interfaces by Zabbix agent:vfs.file.contents["/sys/class/net/{#IFNAME}/operstate"].last()}=2 and {Template Module Linux network interfaces by Zabbix agent:vfs.file.contents["/sys/class/net/{#IFNAME}/operstate"].diff()}=1)
dependency.recovery_expression: {Template Module Linux network interfaces by Zabbix agent:vfs.file.contents["/sys/class/net/{#IFNAME}/operstate"].last()}<>2

template.template: Template Module Linux generic by Zabbix agent
template.name: Template Module Linux generic by Zabbix agent

item.name: System uptime
item.description: System uptime in 'N days, hh:mm:ss' format.

item.name: Локальное время системы
item.description: System local time of the host.

item.name: Имя системы
item.description: System host name.

item.name: Описание системы
item.description: The information as normally returned by 'uname -a'.

item.name: Number of logged in users
item.description: Number of users who are currently logged in.

item.name: Maximum number of open file descriptors
item.description: It could be increased by using sysctrl utility or modifying file /etc/sysctl.conf.

item.name: Maximum number of processes
item.description: It could be increased by using sysctrl utility or modifying file /etc/sysctl.conf.

item.name: Operating system architecture
item.description: Operating system architecture of the host.

template.template: Template OS Linux by Zabbix agent
template.name: Template OS Linux by Zabbix agent
template.description:
Official Linux template. Requires agent of Zabbix 3.0.14, 3.4.5 and 4.0.0 or newer.
Known Issues:
Description: Network discovery. Zabbix agent as of 4.2 doesn't support items such as net.if.status, net.if.speed.
You can discuss this template or leave feedback on our forum https://www.zabbix.com/forum/zabbix-suggestions-and-feedback/387225-discussion-thread-for-official-zabbix-template-for-linux
Template tooling version used: 0.33

trigger.name: Load average is too high (per CPU load over {$LOAD_AVG_PER_CPU.MAX.WARN} for 5m)
trigger.description: Load averages(1m 5m 15m): ({ITEM.LASTVALUE1} {ITEM.LASTVALUE3} {ITEM.LASTVALUE4}), # of CPUs: {ITEM.LASTVALUE2} Per CPU load average is too high. Your system may be slow to respond.

trigger.name: Высокая загрузка процессора ( > {$CPU.UTIL.CRIT}% за 5m)
trigger.description: Current utilization: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1} CPU utilization is too high. The system might be slow to respond.

dependency.name: Load average is too high (per CPU load over {$LOAD_AVG_PER_CPU.MAX.WARN} for 5m)

trigger.name: Мало свободной памяти ОЗУ ( >{$MEMORY.UTIL.MAX}% for 5m)
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1} The system is running out of free memory.

dependency.name: Lack of available memory ( < {$MEMORY.AVAILABLE.MIN} of {ITEM.VALUE2})
dependency.expression: {Template Module Linux memory by Zabbix agent:vm.memory.size[available].min(5m)}<{$MEMORY.AVAILABLE.MIN} and {Template Module Linux memory by Zabbix agent:vm.memory.size[total].last()}>0

trigger.expression: {Template Module Linux memory by Zabbix agent:vm.memory.size[available].min(5m)}<{$MEMORY.AVAILABLE.MIN} and {Template Module Linux memory by Zabbix agent:vm.memory.size[total].last()}>0
trigger.name: Lack of available memory ( < {$MEMORY.AVAILABLE.MIN} of {ITEM.VALUE2})

trigger.expression: {Template Module Linux memory by Zabbix agent:system.swap.size[,pfree].min(5m)}<{$SWAP.PFREE.MIN.WARN} and {Template Module Linux memory by Zabbix agent:system.swap.size[,total].last()}>0
trigger.name: High swap space usage ( less than {$SWAP.PFREE.MIN.WARN}% free)
trigger.description: Free: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}, total: {ITEM.LASTVALUE2} This trigger is ignored, if there is no swap configured

dependency.name: Lack of available memory ( < {$MEMORY.AVAILABLE.MIN} of {ITEM.VALUE2})
dependency.expression: {Template Module Linux memory by Zabbix agent:vm.memory.size[available].min(5m)}<{$MEMORY.AVAILABLE.MIN} and {Template Module Linux memory by Zabbix agent:vm.memory.size[total].last()}>0

trigger.expression: {Template Module Linux generic by Zabbix agent:system.uptime.last()}<10m
trigger.name: только что перезагружен
System time is out of sync (diff with Zabbix server > {$SYSTEM.FUZZYTIME.MAX}s)
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1} The host system time is different from the Zabbix server time.

trigger.expression: {Template Module Linux generic by Zabbix agent:system.hostname.diff()}=1 and {Template Module Linux generic by Zabbix agent:system.hostname.strlen()}>0
trigger.name: System name has changed (new name: {ITEM.VALUE})
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1} System name has changed. Ack to close.

trigger.name: Configured max number of open filedescriptors is too low (< {$KERNEL.MAXFILES.MIN})
Configured max number of processes is too low (< {$KERNEL.MAXPROC.MIN})

dependency.name: Getting closer to process limit (over 80% used)
dependency.expression: {Template Module Linux generic by Zabbix agent:proc.num.last()}/{Template Module Linux generic by Zabbix agent:kernel.maxproc.last()}*100>80

trigger.expression: {Template Module Linux generic by Zabbix agent:proc.num.last()}/{Template Module Linux generic by Zabbix agent:kernel.maxproc.last()}*100>80
trigger.name: Getting closer to process limit (over 80% used)

dependency.name: Operating system description has changed
dependency.expression: {Template Module Linux generic by Zabbix agent:system.sw.os.diff()}=1 and {Template Module Linux generic by Zabbix agent:system.sw.os.strlen()}>0

dependency.name: System name has changed (new name: {ITEM.VALUE})
dependency.expression: {Template Module Linux generic by Zabbix agent:system.hostname.diff()}=1 and {Template Module Linux generic by Zabbix agent:system.hostname.strlen()}>0

trigger.expression: {Template Module Linux generic by Zabbix agent:system.sw.os.diff()}=1 and {Template Module Linux generic by Zabbix agent:system.sw.os.strlen()}>0
trigger.name: Operating system description has changed
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1} Operating system description has changed. Possible reasons that system has been updated or replaced. Ack to close.

dependency.name: System name has changed (new name: {ITEM.VALUE})
dependency.expression: {Template Module Linux generic by Zabbix agent:system.hostname.diff()}=1 and {Template Module Linux generic by Zabbix agent:system.hostname.strlen()}>0
